activities: Enjoy a unique sushi experience made by a skilled grandmother
Taste premium sushi ingredients like fatty tuna and sea urchin
Experience traditional Japanese cuisine in a cozy setting
location_info.location_summary: Wakana Sushi is a charming sushi restaurant in Higashi-Nagasaki, Tokyo, where an elderly grandmother prepares exquisite sushi herself. The restaurant features 13 pieces of special sushi, including high-end varieties, providing great value for money.
location_info.vicinity: 99/1 Industrial Ring Road, Khwaeng Chong Nonsi, Khet Yan Nawa

activities: Experience one of the most renowned sushi restaurants in Japan
Savor ultra-fresh sushi crafted by expert chefs
related_places.location_summary: Sushi Saito is an exclusive sushi spot in Tokyo, known for its attention to detail and high culinary standards, providing an unforgettable dining experience for sushi lovers.

activities: Dine at a popular conveyor belt sushi chain
Choose from a wide selection of sushi varieties
Enjoy a fun and casual dining atmosphere
related_places.location_summary: Sushiro is a well-known conveyor belt sushi chain in Tokyo, offering a fun and casual dining experience with a vast selection of sushi that caters to all taste preferences.
